title: Davids Psalms in metre. Agreeable to the Hebrew, to be sung in usuall tunes. To he [sic] benefit of the churches of Christ. / By the Reverend Mr. John White minister of Gods Word in Dorchester.
author: White, John, 1575-1648.
publisher: Printed by S. Griffin for J. Rothwel, at the Fountain and Bear in Goldsmiths row in Cheapside.,
notes: A variant of the edition with "William Churchil" as bookseller in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
